sentences.english: Heavily suds up your hands with a regular bar of soap or dish detergent.
sentences.chinese: 與一重泡沫的肥皂或洗滌靈定期酒吧裏和你的手。

sentences.english: It also thickens the dishwashing liquid, so you'll feel like you're getting your money's worth.
sentences.chinese: 它也會增稠洗滌靈，讓你有物有所值的感覺。

sentences.english: Before using, work properly with the scouring pure clean then.
sentences.chinese: 使用前，用洗滌靈清洗乾淨即可。

sentences.english: I've also known guys to use a touch of dishwashing liquid to help fight oily hair and scalp.
sentences.chinese: 據我瞭解有人用洗滌靈去頭油，防止頭皮生痘痘。
